alert.note: Alert for Delta; Hopkins (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 10:04AM CST until March 04 at 8:08AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... South Sulphur River Near Cooper affecting Delta and Hopkins Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Texas... North Sulphur River Near Cooper affecting Delta and Lamar Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Sulphur River Near Cooper. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur. A few rural roads will begin to flood. Minor flooding will occur to farm and ranch land adjacent to the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 16.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
